                 </div>
                 <div class="date-outer">
                  <h2 class="date-header">
                   <span>
                    29.4.18
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="date-posts">
                   <div class="post-outer">
                    <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                     <meta content="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BYKRnWo5kxs/WuXn1QQHxUI/AAAAAAACrfo/64OjInsiRackpr73w49XDi7BxBmVL4TsQCLcBGAs/s500/mama_Emilie%2BAngebault.JPG" itemprop="image_url"/>
                     <meta content="36642028" itemprop="blogId"/>
                     <meta content="8179499017161979260" itemprop="postId"/>
                     <a name="8179499017161979260">
                     </a>
                     <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                      <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/versos-de-la-madre-poesia-de-gloria.html">
                       Versos de la madre: poesía de Gloria Fuertes para dormir bebés
                      </a>
                     </h3>
                     <div class="post-header">
                      <div class="post-header-line-1">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-8179499017161979260" itemprop="description articleBody">
                      <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">
                       <br/>
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' id="fbPhotoSnowliftCaption" tabindex="0">
                         <span class="hasCaption">
                          <a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BYKRnWo5kxs/WuXn1QQHxUI/AAAAAAACrfo/64OjInsiRackpr73w49XDi7BxBmVL4TsQCLcBGAs/s1600/mama_Emilie%2BAngebault.JPG" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                           <img border="0" data-original-height="476" data-original-width="597" height="418" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-BYKRnWo5kxs/WuXn1QQHxUI/AAAAAAACrfo/64OjInsiRackpr73w49XDi7BxBmVL4TsQCLcBGAs/s500/mama_Emilie%2BAngebault.JPG" width="500"/>
                          </a>
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' tabindex="0">
                         <span class="hasCaption">
                          Aquest diumenge us invitem a llegir un preciós
                          <a href="https://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20per%20anar%20a%20dormir" target="_blank">
                           poema d'una mare per a dormir
                          </a>
                          al seu/a
                          <a href="https://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20per%20a%20beb%C3%A9s" target="_blank">
                           fill/a
                          </a>
                          . La poesia és la primera llavor ben introduir als xiquets/es al màgic món de la literatura, paraula a paraula, vers a vers, amb
                          <a href="https://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20per%20anar%20a%20dormir" target="_blank">
                           música
                          </a>
                          o sense, amb tota la tendresa de la veu materna... les orelletes van omplint-se de la bellesa de la poesia.
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' tabindex="0">
                        <span class="hasCaption">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' tabindex="0">
                         <span class="hasCaption">
                          <b style="color: #38761d;">
                           Versos de la madre
                          </b>
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' id="fbPhotoSnowliftCaption" tabindex="0">
                         <span class="hasCaption">
                          (
                          <a href="https://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Gloria%20Fuertes" target="_blank">
                           Gloria Fuertes
                          </a>
                          )
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Cierra los ojitos,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' id="fbPhotoSnowliftCaption" tabindex="0">
                       </span>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' id="fbPhotoSnowliftCaption" tabindex="0">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          mi niño de nieve.
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' id="fbPhotoSnowliftCaption" tabindex="0">
                        <span class="hasCaption" style="color: #38761d;">
                         <div style="text-align: center;">
                          Si tú no los cierras,
                         </div>
                         <span class="text_exposed_show">
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           el sueño no viene.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           <br/>
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Arriba, en las nubes,
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           las estrellas duermen;
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           y abajo, en el mar,
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           ya sueñan los peces.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           <br/>
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Mi niño travieso,
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           mi niño no duerme.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Pájaros dormidos,
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           el viento los mece.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           <br/>
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Con sueño, tu sueño
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           sobre ti se extiende.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Ángel de su guarda,
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           dime lo que tiene.
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           <br/>
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           Que venga la luna
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           que a la estrella mece:
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           que este niño tuyo
                          </div>
                          <div style="text-align: center;">
                           lucero parece.
                          </div>
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <br/>
                       <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' tabindex="0">
                        <span class="hasCaption" style="color: #38761d;">
                         <span class="text_exposed_show">
                          <br/>
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <span class="fbPhotosPhotoCaption" data-ft='{"tn":"K"}' tabindex="0">
                        <span class="hasCaption">
                         <span class="text_exposed_show">
                          La il·lustració és d'
                          <b>
                           <a href="http://emilie-angebault.blogspot.com.es/" target="_blank">
                            Emilie Angebault
                           </a>
                          </b>
                          .
                         </span>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div style="clear: both;">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer">
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">
                       <span class="post-author vcard">
                        Publicado por
                        <span class="fn" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                         <meta content="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" itemprop="url"/>
                         <a class="g-profile" href="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" rel="author" title="author profile">
                          <span itemprop="name">
                           Sàlvia
                          </span>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-timestamp">
                        los

                         <abbr class="published" itemprop="datePublished" title="2018-04-29T17:55:00+02:00">
                          5:55 p. m.
                         </abbr>
                        </a>
                       </span>

                       </span>

                        </a>

                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/poemes%20pares" rel="tag">
                         poemes pares
                        </a>
                        ,
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/poemes%20per%20a%20beb%C3%A9s" rel="tag">
                         poemes per a bebés
                        </a>
                       </span>
                      </div>
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-3">
                       <span class="post-location">
                       </span>
                      </div>
                     </div>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                 </div>
                 <div class="date-outer">
                  <h2 class="date-header">
                   <span>
                    25.4.18
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="date-posts">
                   <div class="post-outer">
                    <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                     <meta content="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N54VpN7MhlE/WuC1gBf8NBI/AAAAAAACrYE/7Bht12itLwQ9IEotQSJ8DmadEkVViXx_QCLcBGAs/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell.jpg" itemprop="image_url"/>
                     <meta content="36642028" itemprop="blogId"/>
                     <meta content="3592238948908539188" itemprop="postId"/>
                     <a name="3592238948908539188">
                     </a>
                     <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                      <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/per-fer-el-retrat-dun-ocell-poema-de.html">
                       Per fer el retrat d'un ocell: poema de Jacques Prévert editat per Kalandraka
                      </a>
                     </h3>
                     <div class="post-header">
                      <div class="post-header-line-1">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-3592238948908539188" itemprop="description articleBody">
                      <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N54VpN7MhlE/WuC1gBf8NBI/AAAAAAACrYE/7Bht12itLwQ9IEotQSJ8DmadEkVViXx_QCLcBGAs/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="500" data-original-width="500" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-N54VpN7MhlE/WuC1gBf8NBI/AAAAAAACrYE/7Bht12itLwQ9IEotQSJ8DmadEkVViXx_QCLcBGAs/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell.jpg"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        Us volem recomanar llegir un llibre de poesia infantils fantàstic, tant pel contingut poètic com il·lustratiu:
                        <b>
                         <i>
                          <span style="color: #38761d;">
                           <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/2009/09/pour-fer-le-portrait-dun-oiseau-per-fer.html" target="_blank">
                            Per fer el retrat d'un ocell / Para hacer el retrato de un pájaro
                           </a>
                          </span>
                         </i>
                        </b>
                        , de
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Jacques%20Pr%C3%A9vert" target="_blank">
                         Jacques Prévert
                        </a>
                        , amb unes bellíssimes i suggerents il·lustracions de Mordicai Gerstein i editat per
                        <a href="http://www.kalandraka.com/es/" target="_blank">
                         Kalandraka
                        </a>
                        . El llibre va ser editat a 2011 per
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/editorial%20Kalandraka" target="_blank">
                         Kalandraka
                        </a>
                        i ara podem llegir-lo en català.
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        Ja sabeu que el poema va ser escrit originalment a 1943 i publicat a 1949 i està dedicat a Elsa Henríquez, que l'il·lustra a 1953. Els versos són tota una oda a la creativitat i a la llibertat. Un xicotet pintor, un ocell i una gàbia composen una metàfora sobre la recerca de la bellesa i de l'autenticitat de l'art. L'artista persegueix dibuixar un ocell i pinta una gàbia amb la porta oberta i en ella després pinta una cosa bonica, una cosa senzilla, una cosa maca, una cosa útil per a l'ocell... Les il·lustracions emfatitzen el ritme del poema, reforçant el text. La llibertat és un valor intrínsec del art i l'artista deu ser conseqüent amb ell.
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: justify;">
                       </div>
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-38dP32tV4mM/WuCswwKrajI/AAAAAAACrXk/35LW3JO-jKERf9HHedqHUwlc1VLFf8S2wCEwYBhgL/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B3.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="536" data-original-width="600" height="456" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-38dP32tV4mM/WuCswwKrajI/AAAAAAACrXk/35LW3JO-jKERf9HHedqHUwlc1VLFf8S2wCEwYBhgL/s500/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B3.jpg" width="500"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         Ens agrada la introducció il·lustrada abans del poema, silenciosa i activa, preparant al lector per al que trobarem en les properes pàgines. La traducció del poema està a càrrec de
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Miquel%20Desclot" target="_blank">
                          Miquel Desclot
                         </a>
                         :
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         <br/>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Pinta per començar una gàbia
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          amb una porta oberta
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          després pinta
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          una cosa bonica,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          una cosa senzilla,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          una cosa maca,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          una cosa útil
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          per a l'ocell.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <br/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                         <a href="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--4KWRoxKikU/WuCsyldfEsI/AAAAAAACrX0/6UktSklvVS4nipiC40aaLgm5tpDL0EZEgCEwYBhgL/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B6.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                          <img border="0" data-original-height="464" data-original-width="540" height="442" src="https://3.bp.blogspot.com/--4KWRoxKikU/WuCsyldfEsI/AAAAAAACrX0/6UktSklvVS4nipiC40aaLgm5tpDL0EZEgCEwYBhgL/s500/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B6.jpg" width="500"/>
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         <br/>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Recolza després la tela contra un arbre
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          en un jardí,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          o en un bosc.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Amaga't darrere l'arbre
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          sense dir res,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          sense bellugar-te...
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          De vegades l'ocell arriba aviat
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          però pot molt ben ser que passin anys i panys
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          abans no es decideixi.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Tu no et desanimis,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          espera,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          espera si cal durant anys,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          que la rapidesa o la lentitud de l'arribada de l'ocell
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          no té cap relació
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          amb l'encert del quadro.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Quan l'ocell arribi,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          si és que arriba,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          guarda el silenci més profund,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          espera que l'ocell entri a la gàbia
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          i quan hi hagi entrat
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          tanca suaument la porta amb el pinzell.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         <br/>
                        </div>
                        <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                         <a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9Sk0Jdfta04/WuCswyA67DI/AAAAAAACrXs/5Qn1pvhyDKENus81xM5IbWXopIRNPYY2QCEwYBhgL/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B2.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                          <img border="0" data-original-height="507" data-original-width="600" height="437" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-9Sk0Jdfta04/WuCswyA67DI/AAAAAAACrXs/5Qn1pvhyDKENus81xM5IbWXopIRNPYY2QCEwYBhgL/s500/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B2.jpg" width="500"/>
                         </a>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         <br/>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          En acabat,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          esborra l'un rere l'altre tots els barrots
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          amb compte a no tocar cap de les plomes de l'ocell.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Fes després el retrat de l'arbre
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          i escull la branca més bonica
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          per a l'ocell.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Pinta també el verd fullam i la frescor del vent,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          el polsim del sol
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          i la fressa de les bestioles de l'herba en la calor de l'estiu,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          i després espera que l'ocell es decideixi a cantar.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Si l'ocell no canta
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          és mal senyal,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          senyal que el quadro és dolent.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Però si canta és bon senyal,
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          senyal que pots signar.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          Llavors arrenques molt suaument
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          una de les plomes de l'ocell
                         </span>
                        </div>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          i escrius el teu nom en un angle del quadro.
                         </span>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBgXuoXf3No/WuCsyPnp95I/AAAAAAACrXw/fYUwDMZPMFEFikhBzc276nQqtO-8Z3kYgCEwYBhgL/s1600/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B5.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="1420" data-original-width="1600" height="455" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vBgXuoXf3No/WuCsyPnp95I/AAAAAAACrXw/fYUwDMZPMFEFikhBzc276nQqtO-8Z3kYgCEwYBhgL/s500/Per%2Bfer%2Bel%2Bretrat%2Bd%2527un%2Bocell_Mordicai%2BGerstein%2B5.jpg" width="500"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                        <div style="text-align: center;">
                         <span style="color: #38761d;">
                          (...)
                         </span>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                        Una autèntica joieta de llibre, no sols per als xiquets i xiquetes, també per als adults. Molt recomanable.
                       </div>
                      </div>
                      <div style="clear: both;">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer">
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">
                       <span class="post-author vcard">
                        Publicado por
                        <span class="fn" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                         <meta content="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" itemprop="url"/>
                         <a class="g-profile" href="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" rel="author" title="author profile">
                          <span itemprop="name">
                           Sàlvia
                          </span>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-timestamp">
                        los
                        <meta content="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/per-fer-el-retrat-dun-ocell-poema-de.html" itemprop="url"/>
                        <a class="timestamp-link" href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/per-fer-el-retrat-dun-ocell-poema-de.html" rel="bookmark" title="permanent link">
                         <abbr class="published" itemprop="datePublished" title="2018-04-25T19:09:00+02:00">
                          7:09 p. m.
                         </abbr>
                        </a>
                       </span>
                       <span class="reaction-buttons">
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-comment-link">
                        <a class="comment-link" href="https://www.blogger.com/comment.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=3592238948908539188" onclick="">

                        </a>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-backlinks post-comment-link">

                 </div>
                 <div class="date-outer">
                  <h2 class="date-header">
                   <span>
                    23.4.18
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="date-posts">
                   <div class="post-outer">
                    <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                     <meta content="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2VZzTIfoiUI/Wtz4_82rPEI/AAAAAAACrPM/7q4YOyysCHMeDKw7lJX_8PdC0pzGCD2zQCLcBGAs/s525/sant%2BJordi%2Bprincesa%2Bi%2Bdrac_Marta%2BCabrol.jpg" itemprop="image_url"/>
                     <meta content="36642028" itemprop="blogId"/>
                     <meta content="8494542983818484867" itemprop="postId"/>
                     <a name="8494542983818484867">
                     </a>
                     <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                      <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/sant-jordi-i-la-princesa-la-rosa-i-els.html">
                       Sant Jordi i la princesa, la rosa i els llibres: visca sant Jordi i la poesia!!!
                      </a>
                     </h3>
                     <div class="post-header">
                      <div class="post-header-line-1">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-8494542983818484867" itemprop="description articleBody">
                      <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2VZzTIfoiUI/Wtz4_82rPEI/AAAAAAACrPM/7q4YOyysCHMeDKw7lJX_8PdC0pzGCD2zQCLcBGAs/s1600/sant%2BJordi%2Bprincesa%2Bi%2Bdrac_Marta%2BCabrol.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="453" data-original-width="427" height="525" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-2VZzTIfoiUI/Wtz4_82rPEI/AAAAAAACrPM/7q4YOyysCHMeDKw7lJX_8PdC0pzGCD2zQCLcBGAs/s525/sant%2BJordi%2Bprincesa%2Bi%2Bdrac_Marta%2BCabrol.jpg" width="500"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        Celebrem
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20de%20Sant%20Jordi" target="_blank">
                         <b>
                          sant Jordi
                         </b>
                        </a>
                        i la seua llegenda, passejant entre
                        <b>
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20sobre%20el%20llibre" target="_blank">
                          llibres
                         </a>
                        </b>
                        i
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20de%20la%20rosa" target="_blank">
                         <b>
                          roses
                         </b>
                        </a>
                        , transitant per la poesia. Visca sant Jordi! Feliç
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Dia%20del%20Llibre" target="_blank">
                         <b>
                          Dia del Llibre
                         </b>
                        </a>
                        !
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <b>
                          Sant Jordi i la princesa, la rosa i els llibres
                         </b>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        (
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Isabel%20Barriel" target="_blank">
                         Isabel Barriel
                        </a>
                        )
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         -Sóc la més valent princesa
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         que viu al gran castell!
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         -Sóc el més bell cavaller
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         que passeja per la primavera!
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Es trobaren a la vila,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         es trobaren dins del temps,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         inventaren la llegenda
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         del drac festivaler
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         que espera l'arribada de la festa
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         de Sant Jordi al carrer.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Pinten vida,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         pinten llum,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         pinten sol
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         al damunt de cada llibre
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         i l'amor a cada rosa
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         que ha florit al roser.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       La il·lustració és de
                       <a href="http://martacabrol.blogspot.com.es/" target="_blank">
                        Marta Cabrol
                       </a>
                       .
                      </div>
                      <div style="clear: both;">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer">
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">

                          7:30 a. m.

                 </div>
                 <div class="date-outer">
                  <h2 class="date-header">
                   <span>
                    22.4.18
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="date-posts">
                   <div class="post-outer">
                    <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                     <meta content="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X_1q9gih5-o/WtzsTAVlSEI/AAAAAAACrO8/Wj6HC5WPDFghpaLJ0MhXca5bE5EB6mw2wCLcBGAs/s500/libro_Mila%2BMarquis.jpg" itemprop="image_url"/>
                     <meta content="36642028" itemprop="blogId"/>
                     <meta content="2632472839060888200" itemprop="postId"/>
                     <a name="2632472839060888200">
                     </a>
                     <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                      <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/paraules-sobre-el-llenc-blanc-celebrem.html">
                       Paraules sobre el llenç blanc: celebrem el Dia del Llibre amb poesia
                      </a>
                     </h3>
                     <div class="post-header">
                      <div class="post-header-line-1">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-2632472839060888200" itemprop="description articleBody">
                      <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X_1q9gih5-o/WtzsTAVlSEI/AAAAAAACrO8/Wj6HC5WPDFghpaLJ0MhXca5bE5EB6mw2wCLcBGAs/s1600/libro_Mila%2BMarquis.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="793" data-original-width="800" height="496" src="https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X_1q9gih5-o/WtzsTAVlSEI/AAAAAAACrO8/Wj6HC5WPDFghpaLJ0MhXca5bE5EB6mw2wCLcBGAs/s500/libro_Mila%2BMarquis.jpg" width="500"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <div>
                        <br/>
                        <div style="text-align: justify;">
                         Demà és el
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Dia%20del%20Llibre" target="_blank">
                          Dia del llibre
                         </a>
                         i segur que aprofitareu per regalar i autorregalar-se un bon grapat de llibres, incloent llibres de poesia. Nosaltres s'avancem regalant-vos aquest
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20sobre%20el%20llibre" target="_blank">
                          poema sobre el llibre
                         </a>
                         ,  de
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Joan%20Josep%20Roca" target="_blank">
                          Joan Josep Roca
                         </a>
                         Labèrnia... volant les paraules entre les pàgines en blanc.
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div>
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Com ha aplegat a les mans,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         un ocell qui vol volar,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         en el camp, descansa el blat
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         entre somnis ben profans.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Obro la porta primera,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         a la casa, hi ha enrenou,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         quatre lletres sense sou,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         volen raure a prop de l'era.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Un cop ben arrenglerades,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         comença la processó,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         sense ciri ni llautó,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         com demanen ser lliurades.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Com em sento al capdamunt,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         per encetar aventures,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         un desig i massa mudes
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         van cercant son aixopluc.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       Il·lustració de
                       <a href="https://bibliocolors.blogspot.com.es/2015/12/illustracions-de-mila-marquis.html" target="_blank">
                        Mila Marquis
                       </a>
                       .
                      </div>
                      <div style="clear: both;">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer">
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">
                       <span class="post-author vcard">
                        Publicado por
                        <span class="fn" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                         <meta content="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" itemprop="url"/>
                         <a class="g-profile" href="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" rel="author" title="author profile">
                          <span itemprop="name">
                           Sàlvia
                          </span>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-timestamp">
                        los
                        <meta content="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/paraules-sobre-el-llenc-blanc-celebrem.html" itemprop="url"/>
                        <a class="timestamp-link" href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/paraules-sobre-el-llenc-blanc-celebrem.html" rel="bookmark" title="permanent link">
                         <abbr class="published" itemprop="datePublished" title="2018-04-22T22:19:00+02:00">
                          10:19 p. m.
                         </abbr>
                        </a>
                       </span>
                       <span class="reaction-buttons">
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-comment-link">
                        <a class="comment-link" href="https://www.blogger.com/comment.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200" onclick="">
                         Cap comentari:
                        </a>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-backlinks post-comment-link">
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-icons">
                        <span class="item-control blog-admin pid-1220542556">
                         <a href="https://www.blogger.com/post-edit.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;from=pencil" title="Modificar el missatge">
                          <img alt="" class="icon-action" height="18" src="https://resources.blogblog.com/img/icon18_edit_allbkg.gif" width="18"/>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <div class="post-share-buttons goog-inline-block">
                        <a class="goog-inline-block share-button sb-email" href="https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;target=email" target="_blank" title="Envia per correu electrònic">
                         <span class="share-button-link-text">
                          Envia per correu electrònic
                         </span>

                        <a class="goog-inline-block share-button sb-blog" href="https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;target=blog" onclick='window.open(this.href, "_blank", "height=270,width=475"); return false;' target="_blank" title="BlogThis!">
                         <span class="share-button-link-text">
                          BlogThis!
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <a class="goog-inline-block share-button sb-twitter" href="https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;target=twitter" target="_blank" title="Comparteix a Twitter">
                         <span class="share-button-link-text">
                          Comparteix a Twitter
                         </span>
                        </a>
                        <a class="goog-inline-block share-button sb-facebook" href="https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;target=facebook" onclick='window.open(this.href, "_blank", "height=430,width=640"); return false;' target="_blank" title="Comparteix a Facebook">

                        <a class="goog-inline-block share-button sb-pinterest" href="https://www.blogger.com/share-post.g?blogID=36642028&amp;postID=2632472839060888200&amp;target=pinterest" target="_blank" title="Comparteix a Pinterest">

                        <div class="goog-inline-block google-plus-share-container">
                         <g:plusone annotation="inline" href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/paraules-sobre-el-llenc-blanc-celebrem.html" size="medium" source="blogger:blog:plusone" width="300">
                         </g:plusone>
                        </div>

                      </div>
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-2">
                       <span class="post-labels">
                        Etiquetas:
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/Dia%20del%20Llibre" rel="tag">
                         Dia del Llibre
                        </a>
                        ,
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/Joan%20Josep%20Roca" rel="tag">
                         Joan Josep Roca
                        </a>
                        ,
                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/poemes%20juvenils" rel="tag">
                         poemes juvenils
                        </a>

                        <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/poemes%20sobre%20el%20llibre" rel="tag">
                         poemes sobre el llibre

                 </div>
                 <div class="date-outer">
                  <h2 class="date-header">
                   <span>
                    18.4.18
                   </span>
                  </h2>
                  <div class="date-posts">
                   <div class="post-outer">
                    <div class="post hentry uncustomized-post-template" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
                     <meta content="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vZKB9g7tF7U/WtTCq1uSATI/AAAAAAACq-Q/t41_oIctWJQt-JUyeewyWwSwUR8ImEDbgCLcBGAs/s690/libro_Mariusz%2BStawarski.jpg" itemprop="image_url"/>
                     <meta content="36642028" itemprop="blogId"/>
                     <meta content="8041285547356133960" itemprop="postId"/>
                     <a name="8041285547356133960">
                     </a>
                     <h3 class="post-title entry-title" itemprop="name">
                      <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/2018/04/poema-dedicado-un-libro-preparant-el.html">
                       Poema dedicado a un libro: preparant el Dia del Llibre
                      </a>
                     </h3>
                     <div class="post-header">
                      <div class="post-header-line-1">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-body entry-content" id="post-body-8041285547356133960" itemprop="description articleBody">
                      <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">
                       <div class="separator" style="clear: both; text-align: center;">
                        <a href="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vZKB9g7tF7U/WtTCq1uSATI/AAAAAAACq-Q/t41_oIctWJQt-JUyeewyWwSwUR8ImEDbgCLcBGAs/s1600/libro_Mariusz%2BStawarski.jpg" imageanchor="1" style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;">
                         <img border="0" data-original-height="787" data-original-width="556" height="690" src="https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vZKB9g7tF7U/WtTCq1uSATI/AAAAAAACq-Q/t41_oIctWJQt-JUyeewyWwSwUR8ImEDbgCLcBGAs/s690/libro_Mariusz%2BStawarski.jpg" width="500"/>
                        </a>
                       </div>
                       <br/>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <b>
                          Poema dedicado a un libro
                         </b>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        (Aurora Funes Granados)
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Abrimos tus pastas,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         y son las puertas a la vida.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Eres un tesoro por descubrir,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         la isla donde perderse,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         un viaje sin moverse del sillón,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         alivio para el alma,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         bálsamo para el corazón,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         distracción para la mente,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         … esencia del sentimiento,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         refugio donde llorar,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         medicina para reír.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Diccionario para el sabio,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         para el necio sorpresa,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         regalo para el amor,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         compañía que no molesta,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         amigo que no discute,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         abrigo en invierno,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         en verano albergue fresco,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         música para el anciano,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         pintura para el niño,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         esperanza del nuevo día,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         maestro sin horas,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         catedrático de la historia.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <br/>
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         Callado, siempre callado,
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         y sin embargo…
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         siempre tu voz perpetua.
                        </span>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: center;">
                        <br/>
                       </div>
                       <div style="text-align: justify;">
                        Podeu llegir molts més
                        <span style="color: #38761d;">
                         <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com.es/search/label/poemes%20sobre%20el%20llibre" target="_blank">
                          poemes sobre el llibre /
                          <i>
                           poemas sobre el libro
                          </i>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                        en aquest mateix blog. La il·lustració és de
                        <a href="http://bibliocolors.blogspot.com.es/search/label/Mariusz%20Stawarski" target="_blank">
                         Mariusz Stawarski
                        </a>
                        .
                       </div>
                      </div>
                      <div style="clear: both;">
                      </div>
                     </div>
                     <div class="post-footer">
                      <div class="post-footer-line post-footer-line-1">
                       <span class="post-author vcard">
                        Publicado por
                        <span class="fn" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
                         <meta content="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" itemprop="url"/>
                         <a class="g-profile" href="https://www.blogger.com/profile/09925605358504971206" rel="author" title="author profile">
                          <span itemprop="name">
                           Sàlvia
                          </span>
                         </a>
                        </span>
                       </span>
                       <span class="post-timestamp">
                        los

                 <h2>
                  Poemes d'estiu / Poemas de verano
                 </h2>
                 <div class="widget-content">
                  <a href="http://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/search/label/poemes%20d%27estiu">
                   <img alt="Poemes d'estiu / Poemas de verano" height="244" id="Image9_img" src="http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-M4KMiqHoIfw/WyrcpsBuL7I/AAAAAAACtkc/DVwhGRCSPb8qXetOGuAFdv-GzngqVX8mgCK4BGAYYCw/s250/estiu_Rodo%2BBoulanger.jpg" width="250"/>
                  </a>
                  <br/>
                  <span class="caption">
                   Un clic i molts versos i cançons
                  </span>
                 </div>

                 <span class="widget-item-control">
                  <span class="item-control blog-admin">

                 <h2 class="title">
                  El blog en altres llengües -a "grosso modo"-
                 </h2>
                 <div class="widget-content">
                  <div id="google_translate_element">
                  </div>

                <div class="widget Followers" data-version="1" id="Followers1">
                 <h2 class="title">
                  Enlairem els versos a...
                 </h2>
                 <div class="widget-content">
                  <div id="Followers1-wrapper">
                   <div style="margin-right:2px;">
                    <div>
                     <script src="https://apis.google.com/js/plusone.js" type="text/javascript">
                     </script>
                     <div id="followers-iframe-container">
                     </div>
                     <script type="text/javascript">
                      window.followersIframe = null;
     function followersIframeOpen(url) {
       gapi.load("gapi.iframes", function() {
         if (gapi.iframes && gapi.iframes.getContext) {
           window.followersIframe = gapi.iframes.getContext().openChild({
             url: url,
             where: document.getElementById("followers-iframe-container"),
             messageHandlersFilter: gapi.iframes.CROSS_ORIGIN_IFRAMES_FILTER,
             messageHandlers: {
               '_ready': function(obj) {
                 window.followersIframe.getIframeEl().height = obj.height;
               },
               'reset': function() {
                 window.followersIframe.close();
                 followersIframeOpen("https://www.blogger.com/followers.g?blogID\x3d36642028\x26colors\x3dCgt0cmFuc3BhcmVudBILdHJhbnNwYXJlbnQaByMwYzY2MDgiByMwYzY2MDgqByNmZmZmZmYyByMwMDAwMDA6ByMwYzY2MDhCByMwYzY2MDhKByM5OTk5OTlSByMwYzY2MDhaC3RyYW5zcGFyZW50\x26pageSize\x3d21\x26origin\x3dhttp://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/");
               },
               'open': function(url) {
                 window.followersIframe.close();
                 followersIframeOpen(url);
               },
               'blogger-ping': function() {
               }
             }
           });
         }
       });
     }
     followersIframeOpen("https://www.blogger.com/followers.g?blogID\x3d36642028\x26colors\x3dCgt0cmFuc3BhcmVudBILdHJhbnNwYXJlbnQaByMwYzY2MDgiByMwYzY2MDgqByNmZmZmZmYyByMwMDAwMDA6ByMwYzY2MDhCByMwYzY2MDhKByM5OTk5OTlSByMwYzY2MDhaC3RyYW5zcGFyZW50\x26pageSize\x3d21\x26origin\x3dhttp://bibliopoemes.blogspot.com/");
                     </script>
                    </div>
                   </div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="clear">
                  </div>
                  <span class="widget-item-control">
                   <span class="item-control blog-admin">
                    <a class="quickedit" href="//www.blogger.com/rearrange?blogID=36642028&amp;widgetType=Followers&amp;widgetId=Followers1&amp;action=editWidget&amp;sectionId=sidebar-right-1" onclick='return _WidgetManager._PopupConfig(document.getElementById("Followers1"));' target="configFollowers1" title="Edita">
                     <img alt="" height="18" src="https://resources.blogblog.com/img/icon18_wrench_allbkg.png" width="18"/>
                    </a>
                   </span>
                  </span>
                  <div class="clear">

                </div>
                <div class="widget HTML" data-version="1" id="HTML7">
                 <h2 class="title">
                  Pinejar el que us agrade
                 </h2>
                 <div class="widget-content">
                  <a href="javascript:void((function(){var e=document.createElement('script');e.setAttribute('type','text/javascript');e.setAttribute('charset','UTF-8');e.setAttribute('src','http://assets.pinterest.com/js/pinmarklet.js?r='+Math.random()*99999999);document.body.appendChild(e)})());" title="Pin It">
                   <img border="0" src="//assets.pinterest.com/images/PinExt.png" title="Pin It"/>
                  </a>
                 </div>

                 <h2>
                  Poetes
                 </h2>
                 <div class="widget-content">
                  <ul>
                   <li>

                     Bernat Artola
                    </a>

                    </a>
